This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS initial value should be '0px' 
PASS 'line-height-step: 20px' should compute to '20px' 
PASS line-height-step should inherit 
PASS 'line-height-step: initial' should compute to '0px' 
PASS 'line-height-step: 40px' should compute to '40px' 
PASS '0' should be a valid length 
PASS Interger should be invalid 
PASS Negative length should be invalid 
PASS Computed value should be the absolute length 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
